strings.Value: "Did you hear? A water mill has broken down on the Shrike River. The miller woke up when his millstones stopped moving. He ran out and found a drowned troll, dressed in armor – stuck in the wheel!"
"Buy a city drunkard a mug of beer — you'll hear all about it."
"I've learned of similar cases. Trolls stuck at the top of a city hall, a dead wyvern mysteriously appearing in a brewer's vat... Will wonders never cease?!"
"Obviously, this has something to do with teleportation. But how? Who? And where are these creatures being sent from?"
"I once saw the air open up, and a dead long-shank fall out! Well, not completely dead — Nok-Nok had to finish him off, hehehe."
